DOC.brief_summary: This study aim characterize single dose pharmacokinetics PF-04950616 follow subcutaneous injection abdomen , upper arm thigh .
DOC.brief_title: Pharmacokinetics And Relative Bioavailability Of Bococizumab ( PF-04950615 ; RN316 ) When Administered To The Abdomen , Thigh Or Upper Arm
DOC.criteria: Male female subject 18 65 year age . Body Mass Index ( BMI ) â‰¤ 33 kg/m2 , total body weight 60 kg 90 kg ( 132 lbs 198 lb ) . Fasting LDLC must > 130 mg/dL ( borderline high per NCEP ATP III criterion ) two qualify visit : initial screening ( Days 28 14 ) Day 7 . Poorly control type 1 type 2 diabetes mellitus ( HbA1c > 9.0 % ) . History cardiovascular cerebrovascular event ( eg , MI , stroke , TIA ) relate procedure ( eg , angioplasty ) past year . Subjects meet New York Heart Association ( NYHA ) criteria congestive heart failure ( CHF ) class III IV .
